resources.string: This app allows you to completely manage all your personal belongings. Add every piece of furniture/food/electronics etc right here in your own manager. Never lose track of your inventory again!
Welcome to the add screen for a new category. Over here you can add a new category in which you can store items. Simply give the name..
Select a category to manage or simply add new categories if there is a need for more. Long click in order to delete.
Welcome to the add screen for a new item. Over here you can add a new item. A new item consists out of an picture of the item and some more info about the item.
Welcome to the edit screen for an existing item. Over here you can edit this item.
Welcome to the house info tab. This tab shows you information about your house.
Welcome to the inventory info tab. This tab gives you an insight in your total inventory usage.
